library(tidyverse)
path <- "datasets/"
csv_into_xlsx <- function(datasets_path, file_name = "zaladowane_datasety") {
  file_name <- paste0(file_name, ".xlsx")
  library(openxlsx)
  temp <- list.files(path = datasets_path, pattern = "*.csv")
  wb <- createWorkbook()
  for (i in seq_along(temp)) {
    dataset <- read.csv2(file.path(datasets_path, temp[i]), sep = ",", dec = ".")
    addWorksheet(wb, sheetName = gsub(".csv", "", temp[i]))
    writeData(wb, sheet = gsub(".csv", "", temp[i]), x = dataset, rowNames = FALSE)
  }
  saveWorkbook(wb, file_name, overwrite = TRUE)
}
